definition: to split up/to divide/to break up/fission/schism

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

pinyin: fen1 lie4 qing2 gan3 xing4 zhang4 ai4

definition: anti-secession law of 2005 (whereby PRC claims the right to invade Taiwan)

pinyin: lei4 jing1 shen2 fen1 lie4 xing2 ren2 ge2 wei2 chang2
containing_words.word: 類精神分裂型人格違常

sentences.english: Methods 37 cases of in-patients with schizophrenia were treated with Quetiatine for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 方法對37例精神分裂症住院病人用奎的平治療8周。

sentences.english: The hawkish Cho believed the Separatists had attacked Glid Station.
sentences.chinese: 強硬的喬相信格利德站遭到了分裂分子的進攻。

sentences.english: CNN: The question I would ask is about the Anti-Secession Law.
sentences.chinese: 我想問一個關於《反分裂國家法》的問題。

sentences.english: so it looked like they've been blown apart.
sentences.chinese: 使其看起來像被炸得分裂了一樣。

sentences.english: The problem of transient two-phase flow is solved by split flux vector method in this pader.
sentences.chinese: 本文用矢通量分裂法求解了瞬態兩相流問題。

sentences.english: Analysis gave her an outlet to discuss her problems with schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 分析給她一個討論她精神分裂症的出路。

sentences.english: The party split into petty factions.
sentences.chinese: 該黨分裂成若干小派系。

sentences.english: Chlamydomonas divides frequently and forms two individuals where before there was one.
sentences.chinese: 衣藻經常分裂，原先爲一個而分爲兩個個體。

sentences.english: The first division of the zygote is transverse. The embryogeny belongs to the Onagrd type.
sentences.chinese: 合子第一次分裂爲橫分裂，胚的發育屬柳葉菜型。

sentences.english: The first division of the zygote is transverse. The embryogeny belongs to the Onagrd type.
sentences.chinese: 合子第一次分裂爲橫分裂，胚的發育屬柳葉菜型。

sentences.english: For instance, the country's territory still needs to be unified and it should be alert about national separatism.
sentences.chinese: 比如其領土還未實現統一，仍然要警惕民族分裂主義。

sentences.english: The position of the centromere and the behavior of chromosomes during meiosis also important.
sentences.chinese: 着絲粒的位置和染色體在減數分裂中的行爲也很重要。

sentences.english: Pollen mother cell division showed massive failure and bare fertility occurred.
sentences.chinese: 花粉母細胞分裂多半異常且無生殖結子能力。

sentences.english: Because,unlike software,which can be literally copied, as many as you want identical,the body can't split.
sentences.chinese: 因爲不同於可被不斷拷貝的軟件，肉體是不能分裂的。

sentences.english: Indeed,on the contrary,right? We know cells can split.
sentences.chinese: 事實上正相反，我們都知道細胞會分裂。

sentences.english: The cell at the top is at prophase, showing the condensing chromosomes prior to their separation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的細胞處於分裂前期，凝集的染色體將要分開。

definition: to collapse and fall apart (idiom); to break up/falling to pieces
to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
(of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
